name: Mothball
description:
A simple platformer made for My First Game Jam Summer 2018!

CONTROLS:
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Spacebar - Jump (Hold spacebar to jump higher!)
R - Restart Level

Touch the golden swirl to complete the level!

Huge shoutout to Solace Eternal for being a big help to me on some scripting stuff.

Made with love! Oh, and these programs, too:
Unity - Game Engine
Aseprite - Visuals
Sunvox - Music
